content: the you are loved hat was created to send a message of love to the world god loves you you are not alone the hat is knitted with acrylic yarn from the bottom up in the round the brim is a simple 1x1 rib the body is knit in stockinette until the decrease row i finished with kitchener stitch but another method can be used skill level advanced beginner skills cast on bind off k2tog ssk knit in the round duplicate stitch knit a hat send a message of love
